title: Analysis from graph of derivative - c

content.description: The figure above shows the graph of f', the derivative of the function f, for <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mo>−</mo> <mn>7</mn> <mo>≤</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo>≤</mo> <mn>7</mn> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3CCA@</annotation> </semantics> </math>. The graph of f' has horizontal tangent lines at x = -3, x = 2, and x = 5, and a vertical tangent line at x = 3.
content.question: Find all values of x, for -7 < x < 7, at which f''(x) < 0.

frqParts.text: Find all values of x, for -7 < x < 7, at which f''(x) < 0.

topic.text: 5.9: Connecting a Function, Its First Derivative, and Its Second Derivative

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Identify how mathematical characteristics or properties of functions are related in different representations.
